articles.title: About this site (and me)
articles.description: This is a simple personal website where i will try to showcast some of my projects.
articles.contents:
I am a Data Scientist with 5+ years of experience who is also a
problem solver that has faced a wide range of problems such as portfolio
optimization, risk profiling (Quant finance) predicting productivity of
salespersons, and talent churn (people analytics), in those problems I
have worked from the very understanding of the problem to the
deployment/implementation of the proposed solution. I have a great
toolbox that includes a deep understanding of statistics, math, and
coding. My tech stack includes R, Python, and SQL.

articles.title: mgracian
articles.description: Welcome to the website. I hope you enjoy it!
